backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling authentication, user profiles, label configs, printers, print history, error logs, and admin-controlled operations with password-based session auth and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old LabelConfig entries to the new extended format by adding default layout fields and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behaviors and responsibilities of major frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, environment setup, and production deployment steps for the application on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS theme defining light/dark mode variables and base layout styling for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication, navigation tabs, wake lock status, and wrapping content with printer-related context providers.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen handling password input, authentication calls, backend health checks, and auto-retry logic with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/contexts/PrintProtocolConte: React context managing the selected printing protocol (CPCL, ZPL, ESC/POS) with a provider and hook.
Context for managing WebUSB printer state, connections, errors, and sending CPCL commands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the backend actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and handling AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks wrapping backend calls for authentication, health checks, printers, profiles, and other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook managing the Screen Wake Lock API, requesting and releasing locks and tracking support and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining dark theme variables and touch‑optimized styles for tablets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Devices.tsx: UI for managing printers, USB connection handling, and sending CPCL test prints.
frontend/src/pages/Diagnostics.tsx: Displays print history and error stats with CSV export and placeholder clear function.
frontend/src/pages/LabelSettings.tsx: Complex label configuration editor with Code128 encoding, layout controls, and preview logic.
frontend/src/pages/ScanPrint.tsx: Main scanning and printing workflow with barcode validation, audio cues, and dual‑label handling.
frontend/src/types/webusb.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for WebUSB API interfaces and transfer types.
frontend/src/utils/cpclTemplates.ts: Utilities for generating CPCL print jobs, including layout constants, barcode width estimation, centering helpers, and test/dual-serial label generation.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Helpers to detect IC-specific, network, auth, and config errors and produce user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/scannerOnlyInput.ts: Utility for detecting barcode scanner input by keystroke timing, blocking paste, and normalizing scanned values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata and architectural notes describing the app’s features, backend structure, and known issues.
